languages.text: {n}Лоб Стракса прорезает морщина.{/n} "Пытаться угрожать Вольному Торговцу на {mf|его|ее} судне и правда было бы опрометчивым решением..."
{n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."
languages.original_text: {n}Лоб Стракса прорезает морщина.{/n} "Пытаться угрожать Вольному Торговцу на {mf|его|ее} судне и правда было бы опрометчивым решением..."

languages.text: {n}Auf Strachs Stirn bildet sich eine Furche.{/n} "Der Versuch, {mf|einen Freihändler auf seinem|eine Freihändlerin auf ihrem} eigenen Schiff zu bedrohen, wäre in der Tat unklug gewesen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf Strachs Stirn bildet sich eine Furche.{/n} "Der Versuch, {mf|einen Freihändler auf seinem|eine Freihändlerin auf ihrem} eigenen Schiff zu bedrohen, wäre in der Tat unklug gewesen ..."

languages.text: {n}Un sillon se creuse sur le front de Strachs.{/n} « Tenter de menacer {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} à bord de son propre vaisseau aurait indiscutablement été de la dernière imprudence... »
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sillon se creuse sur le front de Strachs.{/n} « Tenter de menacer {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} à bord de son propre vaisseau aurait indiscutablement été de la dernière imprudence... »

languages.text: {n}斯塔克斯的额头浮现了一道皱纹。{/n}“在行商浪人本人的船上对其实施威胁，这确实是个相当草率的选择……”
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}斯塔克斯的额头浮现了一道皱纹。{/n}“在行商浪人本人的船上对其实施威胁，这确实是个相当草率的选择……”

languages.text: {n}El ceño de Strachs se frunce.{/n} «Intentar amenazar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente en su propia nave habría sido una decisión imprudente...».
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El ceño de Strachs se frunce.{/n} «Intentar amenazar a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente en su propia nave habría sido una decisión imprudente...».

languages.text: {n}ストラッチスの額にしわが寄った。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの自らの艦内で脅しをかけようとしたのは、確かに軽率な選択だったでしょうな…」
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ストラッチスの額にしわが寄った。{/n}「ローグトレーダーの自らの艦内で脅しをかけようとしたのは、確かに軽率な選択だったでしょうな…」

languages.text: {n}Strachs'ın kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "Bir Hür Tacir'i kendi gemisinde tehdit etmeye kalkışmak, gerçekten de mantıksız bir hareket olurdu..."
languages.original_text: {n}A furrow cuts across Strachs's brow.{/n} "Attempting to threaten a Rogue Trader on {mf|his|her} own vessel would indeed have been an imprudent choice..."
